comment.author: 8256808@N02
comment._content: This was taken on Broadway and Houston Street--the building on the left with the wide arches is the Cable Building (McKim, Mead & White, 1894). Houston was later widened in part thanks to subway construction, meaning that some of the buildings closest to the photographer are now long gone.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Funeral procession for Major General Frederick Dent Grant, son of President U. S. Grant, and former New York City Police Commissioner, who was buried at the U. S. Military Academy at West Point. NY Times report of the funeral: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C02EEDF153CE6... Wikipedia bio of Gen. F. D. Grant: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Dent_Grant Photo of the gravesite, on Flickr: www.flickr.com/photos/sheenachi/220605197/in/photostream/?
